subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Thor Hushovd extended his hold on the Tour de France leader's yellow jersey, while Edvald Boasson Hagen of the Sky team won the sixth stage Thursday..
snippet: Thor Hushovd extended his hold on the Tour de France leader's yellow jersey, while Edvald Boasson Hagen of the Sky team won the sixth stage Thursday..
